title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Interactive Design Strategies for Online Mathematics Learning Objects

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can classify interaction levels of online mathematical learning objects into three or more tiers using HCI frameworks
Learners can design two types of interactive mathematical learning objects aligned with specific learning objectives
Learners can develop mathematics learning modules applying interaction design principles based on the WoI (Work-Oriented Interaction) framework through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
